page.title: 05POOL&LEISURE CNTRE KILMARNCK
page.content: KILMARNOCK BATHS AND THE ADJACENT LEISURE CENTRE ARE POPULAR PLACES FOR THE CITIZENS OF KILMARNOCK AND THE SURROUNDING AREA. SITUATED BESIDE THE FIRE STATION THE BATHS IS OPEN EVERY DAY OF THE WEEK,THE FOLLOWING STATISTICS SHOW HOW POPULAR IT IS. IN THE PAST YEAR 112000 SWIMMERS PAID 40p ENTRY FEE PLUS 3000 SPECTATORS AT 20p.UPSTAIRS THE SAUNA SUITE CATERED FOR NEARLY 8000 WHO PAID Â£1.20 ADMISSION PLUS ALMOST 1000 OLD AGE PENSIONERS AND 700 UNEMPLOYED WHO PAID THEIR 50p EACH. THE POOL WHERE THE WATER IS KEPT AROUND 80F BY OIL FIRED HEATING HAD THE FIRST WAVE MAKING MACHINE IN SCOTLAND.WHEN IT WAS OPENED IN 1940.THE"WAVES GOING ON SIGN IS PUT OUT EVERY HOUR SO THAT THE PATRONS MAY ENJOY THE SENSATION. CONTD.
